csv.import.description: Bulk import of documents in the Nuxeo Platform using a CSV file
csv.import.clickOrDrop: Click to select a csv file or drag it to upload.
csv.import.option.emailReport: Receive the import report by email.
csv.import.option.dcMeta: Apply date, author and dublin core metadata
csv.import.error: An error occured while importing the csv file.
